projects_page.blue: "Blue"is a Game Jam project, we had as a subject: the color blue. In one weekend we had to create a game to present it in front of a jury. We decided to make a game in VR, in a blue room with blue objects and the music "Blue Birds". Among all of them, a square is darker and the player must find it by turning his head.
